title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover

Give your pets a safe, spacious, and weather-ready space with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel. Built for both indoor and outdoor use, this sturdy enclosure is perfect for dogs and versatile enough for chickens, rabbits, and ducks.

Key features:
- Generous size: Approx. 4.2 ft W x 4.0 ft L x 4.4 ft H, offering comfortable room to move while fitting patios, yards, garages, or indoor areas.
- Durable construction: Heavy-duty galvanized metal iron with a paint-coated finish resists rust and corrosion for long-lasting performance.
- Pet-safe design: Smooth edges/no sharp edges to protect curious paws and noses.
- Weather-ready cover: Included 210D Oxford cloth cover provides windproof, weatherproof, and sun-shade protection; also noted as waterproof in select specs.
- Secure access: Solid latching swing gate with strong, reliable latches helps keep pets safely contained.
- Great airflow: Open welded-wire panels promote excellent ventilation and visibility.
- Versatile use: Suitable for dogs and small animals such as chickens, rabbits, and ducks; ideal for training, temporary housing, or supervised playtime.
- Easy setup: Panels are designed for quick, straightforward assembly with easy-to-install connections.
- Size options: Available in Small and Large to fit your space and pet needs.

What’s included:
- Welded wire kennel panels
- Solid latching swing gate with strong latches
- 210D Oxford cloth cover

Why you’ll love it:
This kennel balances security, comfort, and durability. The rust-resistant, paint-coated metal stands up to the elements, while the included cover shields pets from sun and rain. With smooth edges, strong latches, and excellent airflow, it’s a reliable enclosure that’s simple to set up and easy to maintain.

Perfect for:
- Backyard play areas
- Patio or garage set-ups
- Small animal enclosures
- Travel or temporary containment
- Indoor zones for safe supervision

Choose your size and create a safe, comfortable space for your pets with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover.
